actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to provide that the appointment of law clerks to Justices of the Supreme Court shall be confirmed by the Senate and the House of Representatives.

summary.text: Provides that the appointment of law clerks to Justices of the Supreme Court shall be confirmed by the Senate and the House of Representatives. (Amends 28 U.S.C. 675)

titles.title: A bill to provide that the appointment of law clerks to Justices of the Supreme Court shall be confirmed by the Senate and the House of Representatives.
